main event: Three objects were observed flying straight heading South over Adak, Alaska on May 16, 1949.
interesting points: The objects were estimated to be flying at a speed of 600 MPH., The observer noted the objects flying at an altitude of 4000 feet., The objects reflected sunlight, preventing determination of their shape., There was no sound or odor associated with the sighting., The observation lasted for an undetermined amount of time.
